list.name: Block
list.title: 区块容器
list.description: 区块容器组件，用于发送数据请求，绑定数据源，做数据容器
list.props: [{"category":"基础属性","label":"文件名称","name":"__fileName","type":"Input","formItemProps":{"required":true,"rules":[{"required":true,"message":"必填"}]}}]
list.docDetail:
Block 区块容器

Block为文件类型组件，对应源码体系中的React Class文件，支持state状态管理、生命周期hook方法、自定义方法、异步数据源、less样式设置。

属性

  • fileName：文件名称，支持字符串形式；
  • children：子组件，支持字符串、ReactNode、变量三种形式；

list.name: Image
list.title: 图片
list.props: [{"category":"基础属性","label":"图片地址","name":"src","type":"Mixin","props":{"types":["Input","Expression"],"defaultType":"Input"}},{"category":"基础属性","label":"图片标题","name":"title","type":"Mixin","props":{"types":["Input","Expression"],"defaultType":"Input"}}]
list.docDetail:
Image 图片

Image组件用于显示图片。

属性

  • src：图片地址，支持字符串、变量两种形式；
  • title：图片标题，悬浮或图片加载失败时展示，支持字符串、变量两种形式；

list.title: 代码
list.props: [{"category":"基础属性","name":"html","label":"代码内容","type":"Mixin","props":{"types":["MonacoEditor","Expression"],"defaultType":"MonacoEditor","monacoEditorProps":{"type":"button","language":"html"}}}]
list.docDetail:
Html 代码

Html组件用于显示html代码片段。

属性

  • html：代码内容，支持字符串、代码编辑器、变量三种形式；

list.name: A
list.title: 超链接
list.props: [{"category":"基础属性","label":"链接内容","name":"children","type":"Mixin","props":{"types":["Input","Expression","ReactNode"],"defaultType":"Input"}},{"category":"基础属性","label":"链接地址","name":"href","type":"Mixin","props":{"types":["Input","Expression"],"defaultType":"Input"}},{"category":"基础属性","label":"跳转方式","name":"target","type":"Mixin","props":{"types":["Select","Expression"],"defaultType":"Select","selectProps":{"hasClear":true,"dataSource":[{"label":"本窗口跳转 - self","value":"_self"},{"label":"新开窗口跳转 - blank","value":"_blank"},{"label":"父窗口跳转 - parent","value":"_parent"},{"label":"顶层窗口跳转 - top","value":"_top"}]}}}]
list.docDetail:
A 超链接

A定义超链接，用于从一张页面链接到另一张页面。

属性

  • children：链接内容，支持字符串、ReactNode、变量三种形式；
  • href：链接地址，支持字符串、变量两种形式；
  • target：跳转方式，有当前页面打开、新窗口打开、父级页面打开、顶层页面打开等方式，支持下拉选择和变量两种形式；

list.name: Text
list.title: 文本
list.props: [{"category":"基础属性","label":"文本内容","name":"text","type":"Mixin","props":{"types":["Input","Expression"],"defaultType":"Input"},"extra":{}}]
list.docDetail:
Text 文本

Text为行内元素，不会独占一行，用来定义文本元素。

属性

  • text：文本内容，支持字符串和变量两种形式；

list.name: Div
list.title: 层标签
list.docDetail:
Div 层标签

Div为块级元素，独占一行，用来定义文档中的分区或节。

属性

  • children：子组件，支持字符串、ReactNode、变量三种形式；
